result.reason: Feature request to add synchronization capabilities for connections to facilitate team collaboration (Team Work), potentially via file sync or a centralized service.
result.approach: Design and implement a connection synchronization mechanism (e.g., file-based watcher, git integration, or cloud provider) to allow sharing and syncing connection lists among team members.
